QuestData.Title: Favor Amongst the Brotherhood, Core Leather
QuestData.CompletionText: Many of the sacred recipes require the skin from Ragnaros' chosen pets.$B$BOffer 2 Core Leather, skinned from the smoldering corpses of the Core Hounds of the Molten Core and you shall be granted favor amongst the Brotherhood.
QuestData.RewardText: Your offering has been accepted. Favor you have gained. Continue and you shall be allowed access to the ancient trades.
